page.title: 16A Day as a 7 year old.
page.content: On Sundays I am quite lazy.I get up around 10.00am. because there is no school.I share a bedroom with my sister Lisa.Its quite boring ,all she thinks of is sticking up posters,having friends up to sleep,reading and tidying the bedroom.We both have a part of the wardrobe.We have a bunk bed.I'm on the bottom because my sister is 12 and I'm 7.I get dressed at elevenish.I don't have a bath or a wash but I do at night time and I always clean my teeth.I sometimes fall out of bed when I'm still asleep.When I have made my bed if the sun is shining I eat my breakfast on the picnic table.After that I get out Mum's chair which I call the up down chair.I always get a book to read so I don't feel lonely.
